name: The Last Drop (POLIMI Game Collective)
description:
In a grey, dying forest, with an increasing number of deadwoods, a drop falls from the clouds to water and save a plant.

Help the drop its duty!

In each level the drop falls down in the sky, tilt the phone left and right to move the drop and avoid all the obstacles, like superhot platforms, wind storms and salt water lakes; reach the plant into the ground and save it!
